li.a: Free Breakfast and Lunch for Students

header.h2: New Deal ISD closed for the remainder of 2019-2020 school year

div.p: Governor Greg Abbot Closes all Public Schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Remote / distance learning will continue...

img.h1: New Deal Independent School District Home

div.div: The Mission of our school is to provide a safe and enriching learning environment where the whole student is nurtured and developed.

New Deal is located six miles north of Lubbock. Our school district includes the city of New Deal and the adjoining rural area that totals 119 square miles. Our district serves approximately 700 students and provides a balanced and challenging curriculum, building the foundation for productive lives.
Students of the New Deal Independent School District excel in academic competition, with the majority of our graduating seniors planning to continue their education. Our campuses are recognized by the state for academic excellence. Extracurricular activities are an important part of a well-rounded education. New Deal is proud to have a history of extracurricular excellence that includes All-State performances in band, leadership accomplishments in career and technology programs, numerous state playoff appearances in both team and individual sports, and numerous UIL literary accomplishments, including a District Championship in UIL Science.
All schools in the New Deal school district are fully accredited by the Texas Education Agency, and our curriculum includes a rigorous and well-rounded education that includes advanced placement, concurrent college enrollment through dual credit classes, tech prep college courses, engineering courses, special education, career and technology education, gifted and talented programs, and English as a Second Language programs. New Deal High School is also an accredited T-STEM Academy, which includes rigorous academics for the advancement in the areas of math, science, and technology. As technology becomes even more important in our lives, we'll be preparing the students of today for the challenges of tomorrow. With computers in daily use from pre-Kindergarten through grade 12, all campuses are connected via a wide-area network, allowing internet access to all classrooms within the district.

Members of the New Deal schools and community would like to invite you to explore the vast opportunities available to our students. We take pride in our programs, which offer cutting-edge technology in a professional and caring atmosphere. The New Deal ISD is a Class AA school district. Our faculty and staff are committed to the success of our students, offering each a quality education and at the same time, setting examples worthy of being followed by your student. Our State of Texas Assessments of Academic Readiness (STAAR) results are typically above the state average, with our district receiving several Gold Performance Awards from the Texas Education Agency. Overall, our scores have been exceptional compared to the rest of the state of Texas, which has become a tradition for our schools. We are committed to educational excellence and opportunity for all students, as we recognize and celebrate each individual's strengths and successes.

We welcome you to join our
New Deal Lion Pride!
